upturn.translation[0].definitions[0].def: an increase in the level of something, especially in business activity
upturn.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: an upturn in the housing market
upturn.translation[1].definitions[0].def: an increase or improvement in the level of something
upturn.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: There seems to be no sign of an upturn in business.
The prospects are good for an economic upturn.
